original_text: If there is no food in a trap, a bird will not fly into it. If the door of the trap closes, it means that it has caught something.
korean_text: 덫을 땅에 놓지 않았는데 새가 어찌 거기 치이겠으며 잡힌 것이 없는데 덫이 어찌 땅에서 튀겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If there is no food in a trap
a bird will not fly into it
sentences.korean_translation: 새가 그 안으로 날아 들어가지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: If the door of the trap closes
it means that it has caught something
